Game.Name: Nightmare Circus (Brazil)
Game.plot: Nightmare Circus is a beat'em-up mixed with elements from platform games and fighting games, made for Sega Genesis/Mega Drive. The hero, Raven, is trying to put an end to the nightmarish circus that only appears on stormy nights. He has to fight twisted and warped circus denizens through a variation of deadly circus levels.Cheat: Tweaker Menu and Scene SelectionNOTE: A six-button controller is required.At the title screen, press Z, A, Down, Down, A, Mode, Z, B, A, Z, A, A, Right. This will bring up a password screen. Enter TOTALCONTROL as a password. Go to the options menu. A new option called "Tweaker" will be listed at the bottom. Set this to on, then hold A and press Mode+Start to access the debug menu. For the level select, return to the password screen by repeating the process above, and enter THELASTLAUGH as a password. This will add the scene selection menu to the tweaker menu.
